id.title: Identity document
id.doc-num-tooltip-id: This is the number on your identity card.
id.doc-num-tooltip-licence: This is the number on your driving licence.
id.no-letter-received: I have not received a letter
id.other-revoked-id-single: Old identity card with a revoked login function
id.other-revoked-id-multiple: Old identity cards with a revoked login function
id.other-revoked-licence-single: Old driving licence with a revoked login function
id.other-revoked-licence-multiple: Old driving licences with a revoked login function
id.login-status-link-activate-id: Activate login function of identity card
id.login-status-link-activate-licence: Activate login function of driving licence
id.login-status-link-revoke-id: Revoke login function of identity card
id.login-status-link-revoke-licence: Revoke login function of driving licence
id.login-status-link-unblock-id: Unblock login function of identity card
id.login-status-link-unblock-licence: Unblock login function of driving licence
id.login-status-tooltip-revoked-id: The login function of your identity card has been revoked at your request. You can no longer log in with your identity card.
id.login-status-tooltip-revoked-licence: The login function of your driving licence has been revoked at your request. You can no longer log in with your driving licence.
id.login-status-tooltip-blocked-id: The login function of your identity card has been blocked at your request. You can no longer log in with your identity card.
id.login-status-tooltip-blocked-licence: The login function of your driving licence has been blocked at your request. You can no longer log in with your driving licence.
id.login-status-tooltip-active-id: The login function of your identity card is active. With your identity card, you can log in to website of governments, healthcare or educational organisations and pension funds.
id.login-status-tooltip-active-licence: The login function of your driving licence is active. With your driving licence, you can log in to website of governments, healthcare or educational organisations and pension funds.
id.login-status-tooltip-inactive-id: Activate the login function to add this login method to your DigiD. Then you can log in to websites of governments, healthcare or educational organisations and pension funds with your identity card. After activation, your identity card will receive the status 'Active' in My DigiD.
id.login-status-tooltip-inactive-licence: Activate the login function to add this login method to your DigiD. Then you can log in to websites of governments, healthcare or educational organisations and pension funds with your driving licence. After activation, your driving licence will receive the status 'Active' in My DigiD.
